trans-unit.source: Verifies an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signatur.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to verify a digital signature made with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen används för att verifiera en digital signatur med den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> to create digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter>att skapa digitala signaturer med den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>och <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>ange nyckeln och hash-algoritmen innan du anropar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> </xref> klass med den angivna nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Använd för <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>att ange den hash-algoritmen innan du anropar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: Instansen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> som innehåller den offentliga nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Anger den hash-algoritmen som ska användas för att verifiera signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange en hash-algoritm innan du anropar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på den hash-algoritmen som ska användas för att verifiera signaturen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the public key to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Anger den offentliga nyckeln som ska användas för att verifiera signaturen.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange en nyckel innan du anropar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: Instansen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> som innehåller den offentliga nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Verifies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS#1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Verifierar den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> PKCS signatur för angivna data.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange en nyckel och en hash-algoritm innan denna metod anropas.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with `rgbSignature`.
trans-unit.target: Data som har signerats med `rgbSignature`.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for `rgbHash`.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen verifieras för `rgbHash`.

trans-unit.source: if rgbSignature matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on rgbHash; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Om rgbSignature matchar signaturen som beräknats med det angivna hash-algoritmen och nyckeln på rgbHash , annars .

trans-unit.source: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The hash algorithm is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - hash-algoritmen är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .
trans-unit.target: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .
